body_html:
I got the same error on Ubuntu 16.04.2LTS with GTX1070 GPU driver 375.51. Googled on to this page and realized that the Original poster StefanoD has the path /usr/lib/nvidia-375 in LD_LIBRARY_PATH.
Issue fixed after carefully modifying LD_LIBRARY_PATH.
body_text:
I got the same error on Ubuntu 16.04.2LTS with GTX1070 GPU driver 375.51. Googled on to this page and realized that the Original poster StefanoD  has the path  /usr/lib/nvidia-375 in LD_LIBRARY_PATH.
Issue fixed after carefully modifying LD_LIBRARY_PATH.
body:
I got the same error on Ubuntu 16.04.2LTS with GTX1070 GPU driver 375.51. Googled on to this page and realized that the Original poster StefanoD  has the path  /usr/lib/nvidia-375 in LD_LIBRARY_PATH. 
Issue fixed after carefully modifying LD_LIBRARY_PATH.
